card.name: Okina, Temple to the Grandfathers
card.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. {G}, {T}: Target legendary creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Oni Possession
card.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has trample. Enchanted creature is a Demon Spirit.

card.name: Orbweaver Kumo
card.text: Reach Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, Orbweaver Kumo gains forestwalk until end of turn.

card.name: Ore Gorger
card.text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may destroy target nonbasic land.

card.name: Orochi Eggwatcher
card.text: {2}{G}, {T}: Put a 1/1 green Snake creature token onto the battlefield. If you control ten or more creatures, flip Orochi Eggwatcher.

attr.value: {G}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Orochi Hatchery
card.text: Orochi Hatchery enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. {5}, {T}: Put a 1/1 green Snake creature token onto the battlefield for each charge counter on Orochi Hatchery.

card.name: Orochi Leafcaller
card.text: {G}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Orochi Ranger
card.text: Whenever Orochi Ranger deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Orochi Sustainer
card.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Otherworldly Journey
card.text: Exile target creature. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Pain Kami
card.text: {X}{R}, Sacrifice Pain Kami: Pain Kami deals X damage to target creature.

card.name: Painwracker Oni
card.text: Fear At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature if you don't control an Ogre.

card.name: Part the Veil
card.text: Return all creatures you control to their owner's hand.

card.name: Peer Through Depths
card.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Petals of Insight
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may put those cards on the bottom of your library in any order. If you do, return Petals of Insight to its owner's hand. Otherwise, draw three cards.

card.name: Pinecrest Ridge
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. Pinecrest Ridge doesn't untap during your next untap step.

card.name: Pious Kitsune
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a devotion counter on Pious Kitsune. Then if a creature named Eight-and-a-Half-Tails is on the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each devotion counter on Pious Kitsune. {T}, Remove a devotion counter from Pious Kitsune: You gain 1 life.

card.name: Psychic Puppetry
card.text: You may tap or untap target permanent. Splice onto Arcane {U}

card.name: Pull Under
card.text: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

card.name: Quiet Purity
card.text: Destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Rag Dealer
card.text: {2}{B}, {T}: Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard.

card.name: Ragged Veins
card.text: Flash Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature is dealt damage, its controller loses that much life.

card.name: Reach Through Mists
card.text: Draw a card.

card.name: Reciprocate
card.text: Exile target creature that dealt damage to you this turn.

card.name: Reito Lantern
card.text: {3}: Put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.

card.name: Rend Flesh
card.text: Destroy target non-Spirit creature.

card.name: Rend Spirit
card.text: Destroy target Spirit.

card.name: Reverse the Sands
card.text: Redistribute any number of players' life totals.

card.name: Reweave
card.text: Target permanent's controller sacrifices it. If he or she does, that player reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a permanent card that shares a card type with the sacrificed permanent, puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles his or her library. Splice onto Arcane {2}{U}{U}

card.name: Ronin Houndmaster
card.text: Haste Bushido 1

card.name: Rootrunner
card.text: {G}{G}, Sacrifice Rootrunner: Put target land on top of its owner's library. Soulshift 3

card.name: Ryusei, the Falling Star
card.text: Flying When Ryusei, the Falling Star dies, it deals 5 damage to each creature without flying.

card.name: Sachi, Daughter of Seshiro
card.text: Other Snake creatures you control get +0/+1. Shamans you control have "{T}: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool."

card.name: Sakura-Tribe Elder
card.text: Sacrifice Sakura-Tribe Elder: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Samurai Enforcers
card.text: Bushido 2

card.name: Samurai of the Pale Curtain
card.text: Bushido 1 If a permanent would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.

card.name: Scuttling Death
card.text: Sacrifice Scuttling Death: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Soulshift 4

card.name: Seizan, Perverter of Truth
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player loses 2 life and draws two cards.

card.name: Sensei Golden-Tail
card.text: Bushido 1 {1}{W}, {T}: Put a training counter on target creature. That creature gains bushido 1 and becomes a Samurai in addition to its other creature types. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Sensei's Divining Top
card.text: {1}: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. {T}: Draw a card, then put Sensei's Divining Top on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Serpent Skin
card.text: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. {G}: Regenerate enchanted creature.

card.name: Seshiro the Anointed
card.text: Other Snake creatures you control get +2/+2. Whenever a Snake you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

card.name: Shell of the Last Kappa
card.text: {3}, {T}: Exile target instant or sorcery spell that targets you. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Shell of the Last Kappa: You may cast a card exiled with Shell of the Last Kappa without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Shimatsu the Bloodcloaked
card.text: As Shimatsu the Bloodcloaked enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of permanents. Shimatsu enters the battlefield with that many +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Shinka, the Bloodsoaked Keep
card.text: {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. {R}, {T}: Target legendary creature gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Shisato, Whispering Hunter
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a Snake. Whenever Shisato, Whispering Hunter deals combat damage to a player, that player skips his or her next untap step.

card.name: Shizo, Death's Storehouse
card.text: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. {B}, {T}: Target legendary creature gains fear until end of turn.

card.name: Sideswipe
card.text: You may change any targets of target Arcane spell.

card.name: Sift Through Sands
card.text: Draw two cards, then discard a card. If you've cast a spell named Peer Through Depths and a spell named Reach Through Mists this turn, you may search your library for a card named The Unspeakable, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Silent-Chant Zubera
card.text: When Silent-Chant Zubera dies, you gain 2 life for each Zubera that died this turn.

card.name: Sire of the Storm
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may draw a card.

card.name: Soilshaper
card.text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, target land becomes a 3/3 creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

card.name: Soratami Cloudskater
card.text: Flying {2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Soratami Mirror-Guard
card.text: Flying {2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Soratami Mirror-Mage
card.text: Flying {3}, Return three lands you control to their owner's hand: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Soratami Rainshaper
card.text: Flying {3}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Target creature you control gains shroud until end of turn.

card.name: Soratami Savant
card.text: Flying {3}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

card.name: Soratami Seer
card.text: Flying {4}, Return two lands you control to their owner's hand: Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards.

card.name: Sosuke, Son of Seshiro
card.text: Other Snake creatures you control get +1/+0. Whenever a Warrior you control deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

card.name: Soul of Magma
card.text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, Soul of Magma deals 1 damage to target creature.

card.name: Soulblast
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Soulblast, sacrifice all creatures you control. Soulblast deals damage to target creature or player equal to the total power of the sacrificed creatures.

card.name: Soulless Revival
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Splice onto Arcane {1}{B}

card.name: Squelch
card.text: Counter target activated ability. Draw a card.

card.name: Stone Rain
card.text: Destroy target land.

card.name: Strange Inversion
card.text: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn. Splice onto Arcane {1}{R}

card.name: Strength of Cedars
card.text: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of lands you control.

card.name: Struggle for Sanity
card.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. That player exiles a card from it, then you exile a card from it. Repeat this process until all cards in that hand have been exiled. That player returns the cards he or she exiled this way to his or her hand and puts the rest into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Student of Elements
card.text: When Student of Elements has flying, flip it.

card.name: Swallowing Plague
card.text: Swallowing Plague deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life.

card.name: Swirl the Mists
card.text: As Swirl the Mists enters the battlefield, choose a color word. All instances of color words in the text of spells and permanents are changed to the chosen color word.

card.name: Takeno, Samurai General
card.text: Bushido 2 Each other Samurai creature you control gets +1/+1 for each point of bushido it has.

card.name: Tatsumasa, the Dragon's Fang
Teller of Tales
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may tap or untap target creature.

card.name: Tenza, Godo's Maul
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1. As long as it's legendary, it gets an additional +2/+2. As long as it's red, it has trample. Equip {1}

card.name: Terashi's Cry
card.text: Tap up to three target creatures.

card.name: The Unspeakable
card.text: Flying, trample Whenever The Unspeakable deals combat damage to a player, you may return target Arcane card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Thief of Hope
card.text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Soulshift 2

card.name: Thoughtbind
card.text: Counter target spell with converted mana cost 4 or less.

card.name: Thousand-legged Kami
card.text: Soulshift 7

card.name: Through the Breach
card.text: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step. Splice onto Arcane {2}{R}{R}

card.name: Tide of War
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures block, flip a coin. If you win the flip, each blocking creature is sacrificed by its controller. If you lose the flip, each blocked creature is sacrificed by its controller.

card.name: Time of Need
card.text: Search your library for a legendary creature card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Time Stop
card.text: End the turn.

card.name: Tranquil Garden
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool. Tranquil Garden doesn't untap during your next untap step.

card.name: Uba Mask
card.text: If a player would draw a card, that player exiles that card face up instead. Each player may play cards he or she exiled with Uba Mask this turn.

card.name: Uncontrollable Anger
card.text: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Unearthly Blizzard
card.text: Up to three target creatures can't block this turn.

card.name: Unnatural Speed
card.text: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Untaidake, the Cloud Keeper
card.text: Untaidake, the Cloud Keeper enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Pay 2 life: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast legendary spells.

card.name: Uyo, Silent Prophet
card.text: Flying {2}, Return two lands you control to their owner's hand: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Vassal's Duty
card.text: {1}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target legendary creature you control this turn is dealt to you instead.

card.name: Venerable Kumo
card.text: Reach Soulshift 4

card.name: Vigilance
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has vigilance.

card.name: Villainous Ogre
card.text: Villainous Ogre can't block. As long as you control a Demon, Villainous Ogre has "{B}: Regenerate Villainous Ogre."

card.name: Vine Kami
card.text: Vine Kami can't be blocked except by two or more creatures. Soulshift 6

card.name: Waking Nightmare
card.text: Target player discards two cards.

card.name: Waterveil Cavern
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. Waterveil Cavern doesn't untap during your next untap step.

card.name: Wear Away
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Splice onto Arcane {3}{G}

card.name: Wicked Akuba
card.text: {B}: Target player dealt damage by Wicked Akuba this turn loses 1 life.

card.name: Yamabushi's Flame
card.text: Yamabushi's Flame deals 3 damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Yamabushi's Storm
card.text: Yamabushi's Storm deals 1 damage to each creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Yosei, the Morning Star
card.text: Flying When Yosei, the Morning Star dies, target player skips his or her next untap step. Tap up to five target permanents that player controls.

card.name: Zo-Zu the Punisher
card.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield, Zo-Zu the Punisher deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
